author: Thijs Heus
message: Awesome, seems to work smoothly. For some reason, this is going to be the moment that Homerun is replacing SAL as containment. I also seem to want to go through it by keyboard. What are the shortcuts/navigations? Per Tab, I can use the arrows - as long as the focus is there. Would be nice to have (say) (shift) Tab to move between the tabs, a short cut for the search box written in the box, and have the focus on HR when appropriate. But thanks!

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message:
I just added a list of shortcuts to the wiki page: http://userbase.kde.org/Hom...

I really need to implement this: https://bugs.kde.org/show_b... :)
Excellent work on this, nice touch that the icon can now be easily changed :) I wonder if the keybinds can be customized?

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: No, keybindings are all hardcoded for now :/
Guessed as much, still that's a minor point. Once again, great stuff!

author: weng ji
message: why is it not available for Precise?

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: Because Precise ships with KDE SC 4.8, but this new version requires KDE SC 4.10.

author: Diego
message: It would be nice if readability would be improved further more. What about a full text background instead of just a shadow; which i many cases is not enough?

replies.author: Aurélien Gâteau
replies.message: I looked into implementing the background halo used by some Plasma applets, but that is unfortunately a bit more complicated to do in QML.
